reviews.review_msg: Just want to say good luck to those who r taking this prof

This course is not difficult but Maggie seems to have a strict marking scheme (she really likes students to create their own tables/figs). If you consult her with your draft before handing it in she is so helpful! She tries hard to listen to students' suggestions so if you dont like something let her know. Lectures are pretty good.

I did not enjoy this course at all. She read from the slides during lecture because those are not her own slides. She is a super hard marker for papers. There are free% for participation and all the questions from the finals were given to us prior. There are two papers plus another one in final. She requires you to use ecology journal citation.
